Html:
Is it possible to limit the optimizer to some conditions?

I want the optimizer (ProtPaladin) to maintain for example 32.000 HP unbuffed, 540 Def and distribute the rest according to the settings of the mitigation/survivability/threat settings. When playing around with these settings, I mostly end up with having way too less HP (around 28 k unbuffed) or having nearly only stamina gems and stamina/armor enchants (> 34 k unbuffed).
Please read the help section on the Optimizer (Help > Optimizer).
Although I did read this, I must have been blind. Sorry for the stupid question and thank you. ;)
